item.title: [Links] Ask HN: Which tools have made you a much better programmer?
item.description: 🍊 HN Link 🌎 .gitconfig · GitHub 🌎 GitHub - jeaye/vimrc: Cleanly organized, medium-weight vimrc for Clojure and C++ 🌎 functools â Higher-order functions and operations on callable objects — Python 3.10.2 documentation 🌎 itertools â Functions creating iterators for efficient looping — Python 3.10.2 documentation 🌎 https://sicp.comp.nus.edu.sg/ 🌎 GitHub - neoclide/coc.nvim: Nodejs extension host for vim & neovim, load extensions like VSCode and host language servers. 🌎 GitHub - jwkvam/jupyterlab-vim: Vim notebook cell bindings for JupyterLab

Let Maid clean up after you, based on rules you define. Think of it as “Hazel for hackers”.

item.title: [Links] Ask HN: What are your favorite low-coding apps / tools as a developer? | Hacker News
